    F

    findConnectedDeviceByIP(Device, String) - Method in class Network.Topology
    Searches for a device by its IP address in the network starting from a given device.
    findConnectedDeviceByName(Device, String) - Method in class Network.Topology
    Searches for a device by name in the network starting from a given device.
    findDHCPServer(Device, String, String) - Method in class Network.NetworkManager
    Finds the DHCP server in the network and assigns an IP address to the device based on the DHCP server's configuration, provided the helper IP matches the VLAN's gateway IP.
    findLayer3Device(Device) - Method in class Network.NetworkManager
    Finds the first connected Layer 3 device (either a Layer 3 Switch or a Router) and retrieves the corresponding VLAN interface information, including the gateway IP and helper IP.
    FreeModeMenu - Class in Menus
    The FreeModeMenu class provides a user interface for managing and configuring a network in Free Mode.
    FreeModeMenu() - Constructor for class Menus.FreeModeMenu
